title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Park Fun
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Park Fun               Park Fun         The "Silent Witness" is one of six trading cards that can be earned while visiting the park. NPS  Bringing kids to Appomattox Court House NHP? Stop in the visitor center for a kid-focused introduction to the historic village, an invitation to the trading card program, or an opportunity to become a Jr. Ranger!
